name: Solitaire Chronicles
description:
Experience this Award-winning Solitaire while traveling through time with your floppy-eared friend Sparky!

Solve each layout by always pairing one higher or lower card with the one on the draw pile in the longest sequence you can come up with. Discover exciting special cards and a variety of boosters which you unlock as you progress in the game.
See how your scores compare to your Facebook friends and make sure to help each other to beat the most challenging levels.
You will love our hand-designed layouts and ever-changing settings, based on such iconic eras like ancient Japan or the Flower Power movement.
Solitaire Chronicles is also available on Facebook, so you can play anytime, anywhere, even when you are offline. No achievements will ever be lost, and you can share them with your friends to get an extra bonus.

Try it now, you will highly enjoy it!

*** Solitaire Chronicles features ***
• Fun, high-quality graphics in all levels
• An easy to learn classic, that becomes a challenge to master
• Lots of levels and new ones added constantly
• Leaderboards to compare yourself to your friends
• Special cards are unlocked as you progress in the game
• Useful boosters for those tricky levels
• Play clever and get ""Free Jokers"" in the game
• Fully synchronized with the Facebook version
• Winner of the Tabby Award for best card game

Login with Facebook to play with your friends - you should always have good company on a journey like this!

MegaZebra has created some of the most successful games on Facebook with more than 80 millions players worldwide. Now, the latest title is also available on the iPad. We hope you’ll enjoy Solitaire Chronicles, and a big THANKS from the whole team!
